thread.title: Very good hotel that could easily be better
thread.title_full: Very good hotel that could easily be better - Review of Washington Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ballerman
title: Very good hotel that could easily be better
text: Our room, among the largest in the hotel, was on an upper level. It was quiet, even with four windows that opened. The bathroom was huge by NYC standards, with a tremendous shower, two sinks and a window. The TV was substandard, but who watches much TV in New York? The lack of competition among hotels in the heart of Greenwich Village may explain why this very good property does not merit a rating of excellent. It really wouldn't take much -- training from the top down in attention to the smallest details, and a touch-up here and there to the interior design and amenities. Still, there is nothing that would prevent us from staying here again, as the location and accommodations are first-rate.
